DataElement.preferredName: Pulmonary Metastatic Lesion Requirement Resection Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to whether or not pulmonary metastatic lesions were present that required resection.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were pulmonary metastatic les
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were pulmonary metastatic lesions present that required resection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have pulmonary metastatic lesions that would require anatomic resection (lobectomy or pneumonectomy) or lesions that are defined as "central" (i.e., central lesion involves or is proximal to segmental bronchi and peripheral is lesion distal to segmental bronchi)?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.3.14 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002157. ak 2022.8.22 Released. ak
